Others: India and England have faced each other 23 times in T20 internationals, in which, the Men in Blue have had a marginally better record, winning 12 matches compared to England's 11 wins.
In T20 World Cups, both teams have won 2 matches each.
The last T20 World Cup match between the two teams came during the 2022 World Cup in Australia, where England beat India by 10 wickets.
India will play England in the second semi-final of the T20 World Cup 2024 on June 27, 2024.
